body: She got an inch away from me despite my flinching, an oblivious smile on her face as she turned around so that she was by my side as I continued walking, "Cam! I thought you were going to be in the Bert for a while."
I clenched my fist without realizing it, unable to look directly at her. I had no idea what to say, "Can we talk in the car?"
"Follow me. We need to talk in the car."
The joy bled from her face, "Is it something bad?"

Bad. That word struck me for some reason. The second I heard it, the thought came to me that maybe I really was a bad person, especially in light of everything. I felt a twist of guilt in my gut, and I came to a stop as I finally turned towards Sarah.
I had no idea if I was going to tell her everything that happened, or to never see me <CHOICE(0)>
